Title: Silverlight SharpZipLib
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project is a complete (less AES cryptography) port version of the C# library SharpZiplib. The library has been converted to be used in Silverlight 3/4 and Windows Phone 7

The original version of the library (for .NET) can be found here: http://sharpdevelop.net/OpenSource/SharpZipLib/

NOTE: Alpha implementations of IsolatedStorage aware ZipFile and FastZip types are available in the latest source.
